title: Add 30 new certification images to gallery

requirements.summary: Add 30 newly uploaded certification images to the CertificationsGallery component's image array
acceptanceCriteria: All 30 new certification images are added to the CertificationsGallery component's image array

New certificates include Six Sigma White Belt, Microsoft AI certifications, Alison diplomas, Techlytics certificates, COREN participation certificate, NECA cybersecurity certificates, Data Protection training certificate, NYSC certificate, and academic credentials
Images are correctly referenced from frontend/public/assets/ directory
Gallery maintains its existing responsive grid layout and interactive features with the expanded collection

file_operations.description: Add 30 new certification image entries to the images array in CertificationsGallery component. The new images are: IMG_4583-1.jpeg, IMG_4582.jpeg, IMG_4203-2.jpeg, IMG_4177-1.jpeg, IMG_4181-2.jpeg, IMG_4176.jpeg, IMG_4175-1.jpeg, IMG_4173.jpeg, IMG_4182.jpeg, IMG_4180-2.jpeg, IMG_4200.jpeg, IMG_4178-1.jpeg, IMG_4198-2.jpeg, IMG_4174-1.jpeg, IMG_4582-1.jpeg, IMG_4583-2.jpeg, IMG_4203-3.jpeg, IMG_4181-3.jpeg, IMG_4199.jpeg, IMG_4198-3.jpeg, IMG_4173-1.jpeg, IMG_4177-2.jpeg, IMG_4175-2.jpeg, IMG_4182-1.jpeg, IMG_4180-3.jpeg, IMG_4176-1.jpeg, IMG_4178-2.jpeg, IMG_4174-2.jpeg, IMG_4200-1.jpeg, IMG_4199-1.jpeg. Reference each image using the path format /assets/IMG_XXXX.jpeg to match the existing pattern in the component. The component already displays 24 certificates, so the updated array will contain 54 total entries. Ensure the new entries follow the existing structure with src and alt properties.

requirements.summary: Configure the 30 newly uploaded certification image files as static assets in the frontend/public/assets/ directory
acceptanceCriteria: All 30 certification images are placed in frontend/public/assets/ directory

Image filenames match exactly: IMG_4583-1.jpeg, IMG_4582.jpeg, IMG_4203-2.jpeg, IMG_4177-1.jpeg, IMG_4181-2.jpeg, IMG_4176.jpeg, IMG_4175-1.jpeg, IMG_4173.jpeg, IMG_4182.jpeg, IMG_4180-2.jpeg, IMG_4200.jpeg, IMG_4178-1.jpeg, IMG_4198-2.jpeg, IMG_4174-1.jpeg, IMG_4582-1.jpeg, IMG_4583-2.jpeg, IMG_4203-3.jpeg, IMG_4181-3.jpeg, IMG_4199.jpeg, IMG_4198-3.jpeg, IMG_4173-1.jpeg, IMG_4177-2.jpeg, IMG_4175-2.jpeg, IMG_4182-1.jpeg, IMG_4180-3.jpeg, IMG_4176-1.jpeg, IMG_4178-2.jpeg, IMG_4174-2.jpeg, IMG_4200-1.jpeg, IMG_4199-1.jpeg
Images are accessible via the correct asset paths in the component

file_operations.description: Place the uploaded certification image IMG_4583-1.jpeg in the frontend/public/assets/ directory as a static asset. This file shows a Lean Six Sigma White Belt certification from the Management and Strategy Institute for Jerry Osiobe.

Place the uploaded certification image IMG_4582.jpeg in the frontend/public/assets/ directory as a static asset. This file shows a Microsoft/IOE AI for SMEs quiz completion certificate for Osiobe Jerry Ebruvwiyor.
Place the uploaded certification image IMG_4203-2.jpeg in the frontend/public/assets/ directory as a static asset. This file shows an IBM Cybersecurity Intro certificate for Osiobe Jerry.
